long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Residential VPN with the biggest choice of locations

Unblock any website with our VPN with unlimited bandwidth. Enjoy true privacy and anonymity. Surf the Web without borders!

TuxlerVPN is the first community-powered VPN ever created. It changes the way we browse the Internet. It makes the Internet equal again, no matter where you are. It allows you to easily access any website and enjoy absolute browsing freedom in full privacy. 

TuxlerVPN offers amazing features like:

✔ A Huge Number of Locations Available

Our network is community-powered and our reach is ever-growing. The more users use our solution, the bigger our network reach and anonymity. 

✔ Precise City Level Selection

Sometimes the country-level selection is just not enough. Choose your location precisely on the city level and surf the Web like a local user.

✔ Residential or Data Center servers

Residential servers provide full privacy, and a huge choice of locations from many different ISPs but their speed is slower than Data Center servers.

Data Center servers are easy to detect and don't provide as much privacy as residential servers, their choice of locations is limited but the speeds are better than on Residential servers.

Most other VPNs offer you only Data Center server option. We offer you both. With tuxlerVPN you can use Residential or Data Center servers depending on your current needs. 

✔ The Only Plugin Offering Full Browsing Anonymity

TuxlerVPN is community-powered and thanks to that you are fully anonymous when using Residential servers. Unlike regular data center VPN providers, tuxlerVPN doesn't leave any patterns and it's impossible to determine that you are using a VPN. 

Thanks to this feature you can browse the Web as a real user without worrying that you may be detected and that your privacy may be compromised.

✔ Equal Web Access To Everyone

Finally, a peer-to-peer VPN solution that offers full anonymity and allows you to access any website by combining the resources of all our community members. 

✔ No Bandwidth Limits. No Ads.

There are no bandwidth limits and the time of usage is unlimited, period. You can always get your privacy protected by simply clicking on the "Connect" button. Whenever you connect to our service you can be sure that your identity is protected. We don't serve any ads.

✔ Encrypted Connections

All connections are encrypted and anonymous so you can be sure that all your browsing is secure. It comes in handy especially for travel when you need to secure your public Wi-Fi connection.

✔ One-click Activation, No Configuration Needed

All you have to do to join our community network is to install our software and click on the "Connect" button. From that moment your privacy is fully protected and your connections are encrypted.

✔ Fresh And Constantly Renewed Servers 

Aren't you tired of VPNs with the same old servers that are blocked everywhere? Our service's strength is in its great community. When you join our community you will be able to use the best quality, undetectable VPN service.

This extension requires either the tuxlerVPN Application or a previously activated Premium Account to work. 

After installing the extension you will be given a choice of a Premium Account login or Application installation. The Application is located on our secure server and easily installs with just a few clicks. 

After installation of the Application you will be able to use our Freemium version which allows you to use our services with only two limitations:
Speed limitation
Daily location changes limitation
Bandwidth and usage time are unlimited!

If you have any technical issues, suggestions or you just want to get in touch with us, please write to us at support@tuxlervpn.com. Our support team works 24/7 and usually answers questions within a couple of minutes.

You can find more information about tuxlerVPN on www.tuxlervpn.com
